content: Hello! I've been lead to believe by the documentation that lake should be included with lean4 toolchains managed via elan, but it doesn't appear to be included. elan default leanprover/lean4:stable followed by lake init lean-play gives the a "does not have the binary ...` error. Do I need to do something specific to install it? (elan 1.3.1, lean v 4.0.0-m2)
Switching to nightly seemed to work though
A nightly version should include it: elan default leanprover/lean4:nightly
ok :sweat_smile: bit confusing from a docs perspective, but I get it, things are new. Thanks!
Hopefully there's a new stable release soon that isn't as old :grinning:
Pi Lanningham has marked this topic as resolved.
